content: I am a fifth-year Ph.D. student at École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) working on private and robust machine learning. I am mainly a practitioner but also study algorithmic tools from a theoretical perspective.
summary: I am a fifth-year Ph.D. student at École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) working on private and robust machine learning. I am mainly a practitioner but also study algorithmic tools from a theoretical perspective.
title: Georgios Damaskinos
